concept.title: Creating and updating a messaging policy by using
concept.shortdesc: You can use the REST API POST method to create or update one or more messaging policy objects. There are three types of messaging policy; topic policy, subscription policy and queue policy. If the messaging policy that is specified in the request does not exist in the configuration, then the messaging policy is created. Otherwise, the messaging policy configuration is updated.

conbody.p:
To create a messaging policy, you must complete at least one of the following tasks:
Create a topic policy.
Create a subscription policy.
Create a queue policy.
